## Global Env

```{r}
globalenv()

parent.env(.GlobalEnv)
parent.env(as.environment("package:stats"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:graphics"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:grDevices"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:utils"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:datasets"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:methods"))
parent.env(as.environment("Autoloads"))
parent.env(as.environment("package:base"))


```

### Buscar Ambientes Pai (Recursivamente)
```{r}

envs <- function(ambiente){
 
  if(environmentName(ambiente)=="R_EmptyEnv"){
    return ('Ambiente informado é R_EmptyEnv.')
    }
    
    print(parent.env(ambiente))
    
    envs(parent.env(ambiente))

}
envs(globalenv())

```


## Criando Ambientes

```{r}
amb1 <- new.env()

amb1

parent.env(amb1)

amb1$x <- 10

x <- 15

x
amb1$x

```
